dict.acceptation: 清洁剂；保洁员；吸尘器；干洗店；
更清洁的(clean的比较级)；整齐的；新的；正派的；

sent.orig: The Screen Cleaner is a non-toxic cleaner for keeping your screens pristine and your environment toxin-free!
sent.trans: 无毒配方是您的屏幕和您的日常生活都远离有毒化学剂的污染。

sent.orig: Bidet, Water Purifier, Water Softner, Air Cleaner, Rice Cooker, Vacuum Cleaner Vacuum Equipment and System.
sent.trans: 采购产品坐浴盆，水清洁剂，空气清洁工人，电大米煲，吸尘器真空设备和系统。

sent.orig: Pry back three clips retaining air cleaner cover to air cleaner housing.
sent.trans: 撬起三个紧固空气清洁器盖至清洁器壳体的夹环。

sent.orig: We expect that water will become cleaner and cleaner before long.
sent.trans: 我希望不久的将来，水会变得干净起来。

sent.orig: Carpets not only GET cleaner, they STAY cleaner longer.
sent.trans: 地毯不但洗得干干净净，而且可保持干净很长久。
